module.title: CSS Fundamentals
module.description: Style your pages with selectors, colors, and the box model

lessons.title: Selectors & Specificity
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Element: `p {}`, Class: `.btn {}`, ID: `#header {}`
- Combinators: `div p` (descendant), `div > p` (child)
- Pseudo-classes: `:hover`, `:focus`, `:first-child`
- Specificity: ID > Class > Element

---

# CSS Selectors

lessons.title: The Box Model
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Every element is a box: content + padding + border + margin
- `box-sizing: border-box` includes padding/border in width
- `margin` is space outside, `padding` is space inside
- Use `border-box` globally for predictable sizing

---

# The Box Model

lessons.title: Colors & Typography
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Colors: named, hex `#ff0000`, rgb `rgb(255,0,0)`, hsl
- `font-family`, `font-size`, `font-weight`, `line-height`
- `text-align`, `text-decoration`, `text-transform`
- Use `rem` for font sizes (relative to root)

---

# Colors & Typography

lessons.title: CSS Units
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `px` - fixed pixels
- `rem` - relative to root font size (best for font sizes)
- `em` - relative to parent font size
- `%` - relative to parent
- `vw`/`vh` - viewport width/height
